name: Daiyousei and Cirno Have a Calm and Relaxing Winter Day
name_original: Daiyousei and Cirno Have a Calm and Relaxing Winter Day
description:
A short mouse bullet hell entry with minor visual novel elements.

Credits:
CYCzen - Artist - https://cyczen.itch.io/
Kiroko - Programmer - https://kirokko.itch.io/
Prismriver - Composer - https://prismriver-orchestra.itch.io/
Saishoo - Artist - https://itch.io/profile/hartmann6142

A special thanks to cetaceanHussbuster and Vinyis for helping overlook the script

Sound effects courtesy of GDC's game audio bundle, the site Otologic, and Wareya from the jam discord. (All of these are already allowed for commercial and or personal use)

Controls:
Throw Snowball -z / x / e / w / r
Focus (move slow / better aim) - left shift / right shift / right click
Select Option - z / click on option
Progress Dialogue - z / x / left click / mouse wheel up
Rewind Dialogue - right click / mouse wheel down
Movement - mouse movement

If you want an extra challenge, you can aim to perfect the game and get a nice gold star on your main menu!

This entry makes use of a bullethell framework I built a couple months ago here and never got to make use of. While multiple things with its skeleton was changed / replaced during the period of this jam, it has helped a LOT in speeding up this jam project.
